resources.string: Welcome to Androminion, an unofficial Android implementation of the award-winning strategy card game Dominion, by Donald X. Vaccarino and published by Rio Grande Games.
If you don\'t know how to play Dominion, read the How to Play section for a summary.

This is the Supply. The Supply consists of cards available to buy during the game.

Basic Treasure cards are on top with Curse and basic Victory cards under. Beneath those are the Kingdom cards, which change every game. Any landscape and non-Supply cards will be shown under the Supply.

The cost of each card is in the yellow circle to the left of its name (red circles show Debt costs and blue circles are costs with potion).

Beneath is the remaining count of cards in that pile.

Any tokens on piles will be shown on the right.

You can long-press on any card to see its full details.
This is the turn view. Here you can see stats for each player and info about the current turn.
The current turn\'s player is highlighted, and players are listed in turn order.
If enabled, the numbers under players\' names show the number of cards in their deck, hand, total cards and Victory points.

Any tokens a player has are shown to the right of their name.

Long-press a player for full details.
A message with the currently requested input is shown above the players. The current number of actions, buys, and coins are shown at the top of the screen.
This first column shows the cards in your hand. Only you can see them.
The second column shows the cards that are in play. This is visible to all. Grayed-out cards here were played for this turn but are not currently in play.
If you have cards on mats or other set-aside areas, swipe the view left to show them. The trash is shown in the far right column and is visible to all.
If any of these columns gets too long, you may need to drag the view up or down to see everything.
Again, long-press any card to show details.

Finally, a history of the game is displayed in the scrollable game log at the bottom of your screen.

You can always bring up this help again through the menu while a game is running.
Good luck, and enjoy the game!
